resources.string: Final Touch Auto Detailing Tablet App

Welcome to Final Touch Auto Detailing! We specialize in polishing, cleaning, painting, and fixing! Our polish service makes your car sparkle. We hand polish every square inch. Our cleaning service removes all crumbs on the inside and all dirt on the outside. Our painting service can be a full re-paint or a brand new color of your choice. Last but not least, we will fix anything on the outside of your car such as bumpers, windshields, etc. We are the ultimate automotive detailing store because we can do just about anything.
$250 - Full body re-paint or new color
